name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SaleSquared Click To Call Chrome Extension

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make outgoing calls to any number directly from the chrome browser using SaleSquared's Cloud Telephony Service.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Click to call phone numbers available on any web page. Make & receive more sales calls, and track all calls.

TERMS and PRIVACY POLICY
By using this Chrome Extension, you agree to the SaleSquared Terms & Conditions available at https://salesquared.io/terms-conditions.html and Privacy Policy available at https://salesquared.io/privacy-policy.html

DATA & COOKIE USE DISCLOSURE: 
In addition to data use information mentioned in our privacy policy, this extension reads your SaleSquared cookies to ensure that you logged in to your SaleSquared account. If you are logged in, we use this information to fetch your phone numbers, allowing you to make and receive phone calls and texts from any Chrome tab. 

CHROME PERMISSION USAGE DISCLOSURE: 
This chrome extension requires the following permissions from your Chrome browser: 
 1. contextMenus: Used to give you an open to right-click and select any phone number to make calls and send sms.
 2. storage: Used to save your cookie in local storage so that we only request cookies sometimes. Also, store your audio device settings to ensure you use the correct Input and Output Audio Device while answering your phone calls. 
3. cookies: Used to read your SaleSquared cookies to ensure that you are logged in to use your SaleSquared account (as mentioned in Data Use Disclosure) 
4. notifications: Used to send you notifications for incoming phone calls and sms

DISCLAIMER:
This extension uses Google Analytics to collect extension usage statistics to help improve user experience. If you want to opt-out of Google Analytics tracking, please visit http://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout, or you can set up a filter in Adblock Plus or similar ad blocker tools like AdBlock, uBlock or Adblock Pro.

================================================

ABOUT THIS EXTENSION

SaleSquared Chrome Extension works with your SaleSquared.io account. It allows you to add click-to-call and click-to-text buttons beside valid phone numbers in your CRM (that SaleSquared integrates with). It also notifies you when there is an incoming phone call on your SaleSquared phone number. You can answer incoming calls directly from your Chrome browser.

Requirement: This extension requires SaleSquared.io paid account. Pricing starts at Rs.899/month.

================================================
